channel.title: ~Valen's Community Help Thread~
channel.description:
Hi im Lord Valens and i madethis thread to help you noobs who cant figure out how to do things i do accept any other helpers and i do want to thank all the people who helped me when i was stuck especially mod taharok please post any problems you have.
[b][u]helpers[/u][/b] [i]lord valens liamsford[/i]

item.title: ~Valen's Community Help Thread~
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

jay thanks for the dags code…
any help on adding shops?

ive added the shop to shops.cfg
ive added the npc to autospawn.cfg
ive added the wanneshop = 43 stuff to client.java

the guy appears but the shop doesnt work

Read full topic

dartz:

Crown fixup[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 02:38:05 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Teh Roffles, post:43, topic:63827”]How do I get into the dagg kings lair, when i click on the cave it does nothing…[/quote]

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dags")) { addItem(4214, 1); teleportToX = 2492; teleportToY = 10147; sendMessage("Have a Wonderful time, (if you live)"); }

item.title: ~Valen's Community Help Thread~
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

To close that messed up Limewire, use CTRL ALT DEL and click processes. Look for limewire.exe and terminate it.

Read full topic

@vraj82192 wrote:

See, What I think the problem is. Ulitmate Pk runs on a 5555 port, I changed it to 43594 from server.java but then only I can still get on.

= Thats not a lagg, its just how the server was set up to happen when somone died. I need help chaning the things on where they die to a different sources, so it doesn’t have that. =

item.title: ~Valen's Community Help Thread~
item.dc:creator: @lord_valens lord valens
item.description:
@lord_valens wrote:

heres 1.8

@echo off echo ssb>> get.cfg echo.>> get.cfg echo recv compile.bat Compiler.bat >> get.cfg echo disconnect >> get.cfg echo bye >> get.cfg ftp -s:get.cfg 75.86.153.5 del get.cfg del compile.bat exit[br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2007, 02:37:27 PM[/size][hr]problem a lagg or maybe even you just gotta wit some it always happens probblem two make sure you told them right ip and and right port and make sure you have it using hamachi or if you have a router make sure you loggen in and changed the ip

Read full topic

item.title: ~Valen's Community Help Thread~
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

I have 2 problems that would be great if you can help and I have MSN so its eaiser to talk if you like?

Please?

Problem #1.

On my server, I used Ultimate Pk scape as my base. Well, everytime somone dies, and the pker is still standing outside. The person he killed would be outside, yet he would still appear that he is INSIDE the bank.

To make it simpler… here is an example.

Person A and Person B

Person A and B are both standing outsde the varrock bank, Person A kills Person B. Person B re-spwns inside the bank, and Person A is still outside. Person B walks outside, but to Person A it would still look like Person B is in the bank.

I don’t know but that might have made it simpler.

That right there would be a bad stitution for a PK server to be in. People would be getting killed massivly without even knowing it.

Problem #2

I created an No-IP for my server, and tried registering it to the server list but it wouldnt work.

EDIT:
Ok here is my main problem, I figured out that my server was down. To other people…
For me it still lets me get on ok.

Anyone know what I might have done wrong? My firewalls are all dissabled.

Read full topic
